section.title: The &PLATFORM_NAME; SIP Event Subscription Client Enabler
section.para: The &PLATFORM_NAME; SIP Event Publication exposes a JAIN SLEE enabler for applications which want to interact as clients of a SIP Event Subscription Server, such as a PS or RLS. The enabler does not uses SIP network protocols, thus providing better performance and less overhead to network communications.
The Enabler is an SBB, which can be used in child relations, with a simple asynchronous interface.
